FrageText.de: Was bedeutet die Stellung des Verkehrspostens für Sie?
FrageText.en: What does the position of the traffic guard mean for you?
FrageText.hr: Što za Vas znači položaj prometnog policajca?
FrageText.sl: Kaj pomeni položaj prometnega policista za Vas?
FrageText.tr: Size göre trafik polisinin duruş şekli ne anlama gelir?

de.Text: Freie Fahrt nur nach rechts oder links

en.Text: Those driving in my direction must stop
It is permitted to drive to the right or to the left

hr.Text: Slobodan prolaz samo udesno ili ulijevo

sl.Text: Prosto vožnjo samo v desno ali v levo

tr.Text: Sağdan ve soldan gelenler için geç
